name: $lastRaceResults
description: Get the full results from the most recently completed F1 race (positions, drivers, constructors, points, times, fastest laps).

name: $raceResults
description: Alias for $lastRaceResults. Returns the most recent race results.

name: $nextRace
description: Get basic information and schedule for the next/upcoming race weekend (circuit, practice/qualifying/race times).

name: $raceWeekend
description: Alias for $nextRace. Returns the upcoming race weekend schedule and circuit details.

name: $driverStandings
description: Returns the current driver standings (position, points, wins and driver details).

name: $constructorStandings
description: Returns the current constructor standings (position, points, wins and constructor details).

name: $qualifyingResults
description: Returns qualifying results (Q1/Q2/Q3 times and grid positions) from the most recent qualifying session.
